{"id":954220359,"question_id":2816,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1684637017,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"10 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/954220359/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Lexicographically Smallest Palindrome","memory":"44.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String makeSmallestPalindrome(String s) {\n        \n        int len = s.length();\n        int st=0, ed=len-1;\n        \n        \n        char[] arr = s.toCharArray();\n        \n        while(st<ed){\n           if(arr[st]<arr[ed]){\n               arr[ed] = arr[st];\n           }else if(arr[ed]<arr[st]){\n               arr[st] = arr[ed];\n           }\n            st++;\n            ed--;\n        }\n        \n        \n        return new String(arr);\n    }\n    \n//     private boolean isPal(String s ){\n        \n//         int \n        \n//     }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"lexicographically-smallest-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
